preclusion: Students who are taking or have taken LL4075.
description:
This course teaches the overlap between intellectual property and competition law. Students will be challenged to explore the intrinsic tensions that lie between the
statutory regimes that regulate market dominance, restrictive agreements and the monopolistic prerogatives and assertions by holders of intellectual property rights.
title: IP and Competition Law
prerequisite: NUS Compulsory Core Curriculum or its equivalent..
